text: It’s so crazy when people say “if you breastfeed you won’t have to worry about the formula shortage!” I have low milk supply, so to keep my baby fed I depend on formula. I wish I could breastfeed so I wouldn’t be panicking about the shortage right now. But I don’t have a choice.

A search of his phone allegedly “revealed anti-Asian sentiment,” Queens DA Melinda Katz said. “Hate crimes require a need to show the victim was targeted because of her ethnicity,” Katz said. “Our investigation has now concluded & now the defendant is charged with a hate crime.”

“He was indicted by a Queens County grand jury with a hate crime.” and faces up to 12 months in prison.
